page.title: 19HALSTON COTTAGES PONTESBURY
page.content: Halston Cottages is a small hamlet of about a twenty houses. Most of the people have lived there as long as 10 to 25 years. They moved there because it was closer to their work and they travel over five miles to their work, mostly by car. The library is about ten miles away, but other amenities are within three miles. The people take part in various activities, the most popular being golf, walking, cycling, gardening, knitting and reading. Very few people go to church, and the church is not active during the week. The Junior school is less than three miles away and children go there by school bus or bicycle. There is a local magazine for the area.
